segments.text: Very well , thank you . And you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine , too , thanks . We met one year ago . We both took part in a party held by our company last year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . How nice to see you again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me too . How is your family ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Say ' hello ' to them for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . They will be happy you asked about them .
segments.speaker: S2
